Nim TestKit Test Integration for Jujutsu

Provides test-specific integration with Jujutsu version control system. This module handles test optimization, caching, and conflict testing for Jujutsu repositories.

Types

JujutsuInfo = object
  isJjRepo*: bool
  currentChange*: string
  modifiedFiles*: seq[string]
  conflictedFiles*: seq[string]
  operationLog*: seq[string]
  workspaces*: seq[string]
TestCache = object
  changeId*: string
  contentHash*: string
  results*: seq[tuple[file: string, passed: bool]]
  timestamp*: Time
TestHistory = object
  changeId*: string
  parentChanges*: seq[string]
  results*: seq[TestHistoryResult]
  coverage*: float
  timestamp*: Time
TestHistoryResult = object
  name*: string
  file*: string
  passed*: bool
